author: hengne
body:
Updates include:
1.) backport 3 new BPH workflows to replace 3 old ones that have low gen level efficiency. 
2.) change H130 to H125 workflow name due to default mH value in pythia changed.
3.) change to use realistic Beamspot
4.) update gen-sims produced with 7_1_20_patch2 + realBS
5.) update GTs with realistic BS from @mmusich , diff with previous GTs:
-  run2_mc ==> 
  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/gtList/GTdiff.html?GlobalTag=MCRUN2_71_V1&GlobalTag2=MCRUN2_71_V3
- run2_mc_50ns == > 
  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/gtList/GTdiff.html?GlobalTag=MCRUN2_71_V0&GlobalTag2=MCRUN2_71_V2
- run2_design ==> 
  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/gtList/GTdiff.html?GlobalTag=DESRUN2_71_V0&GlobalTag2=DESRUN2_71_V1
title: matrix update for relval after 7_1_20_patch2 gensim
